vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to come, arrive
1a) (P'al) to come
1b) (Aphel) to bring
1c) (Hophal) to be brought
2) used in the NT in the phrase "maranatha" -"Lord come"
Aramaic of a.tah (אָתָה "to come" H0857)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 來
1a) (P'al) 過來
1b) (Aphel) 帶來
1c) (Hophal) 被帶到
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 来
1a) (P'al) 过来
1b) (Aphel) 带来
1c) (Hophal) 被带到
